response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product not only fulfills its primary function but also embodies quality, durability, and style. Considering its exceptional value and the satisfaction it promises, we believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. For you, we're offering this remarkable item at an exclusive price of $120. We're confident that this investment will provide you with immense value and benefit. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience. Let us know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 120}
